title: ninnenthO (pada varNam)
sahitya:
ninnentO vEDi nannau brOva nIkEla dayarAdu rAma

anupallavi

 nannEramu lencaku shrI nAtha shrI rAmapuravAsa

ciTTasvara sAhitya

nA manavini bhavajala tolaginci nanu vEga karuNa jUDa samayamu 
nabhO maNDalamuna nIvale gAna satatamu parAkusEya mEra shrI raghuvara

caraNam

 nenaruncarA sAmi nAdupai nI

 1

nA gati sATi vandya shrI sAdarAdhIsha
 
2

 nI pada kamalamulE gatiyanucunE niratamu madilO nijamugAnu nammina
 
3

 anudinamunu canuvuna nanu manupamu ninu vinayamunu golciti vanaja nayana
 
4

 sAmaja varada tAmasamulanu pakaghana pApamulanu dunimi nanu kAvA 
        samayamancu nidhi konenE pAdAmbujamula paipaTi sharaNaNTini raghunAtha
 
5

 nAga shayana nanu maravaka bhava bhayamulanu dIrccumanucunu paluvidhamulanE 
        pogaDi nAdukata sarALa mukhaTIrAnu shubhada rAmapuri nivAsa ravi suta hita
